description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fe6og","text":"Protocol is based on the NOMe-seq protocol (Kelly et al.; 2012) with major modifications in the incubation times to work with fixed cells (Nordström et al.; 2019) and at the library preparation step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4395i","text":"Required Kits","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ipvm","text":"Accel-NGS Methyl-Seq DNA Library Kit (Swift Bioscience, Cat. N.: 30024)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rfm6","text":"Methyl-Seq Set A Indexing Kit (12 indices, 24 rxns) (Swift Bioscience, Cat. N.: 36024)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btiuh","text":"EZ DNA Methylation-Gold Kit (Zymo Research, Cat. N.: D5005)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k5ll","text":"Qubit dsDNA High Sensitivity Assay (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: Q32851)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1fla","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0nts","text":"Buffers and Mastermixes","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v0eq","text":"GpC methylation mix I (for control DNA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9usq8","text":"5µl 10x GpC buffer (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76frd","text":"1µl 32mM SAM (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54s85","text":"5µl M.CviPI (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da1dd","text":"19µl nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1or9n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8scv","text":"2% Formaldehyde solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81jke","text":"Dilute 1ml of 16% Formaldehyde solution (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: 28908) with 7ml PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"814c0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3k41","text":"2M Glycine solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bprbd","text":"Mix 30.024g of Ultrapure Glycine (Invitrogen, Cat. N.: 15527013) with 200ml of PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gr4e","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t57d","text":"Lysis buffer (1ml)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a22sf","text":"10mM Tris-HCI, pH 8.0 (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: 15567027)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4di8","text":"10mM NaCl (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: AM9760G)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vg52","text":"0.2% Igepal-CA630 (Sigma-Aldrich, Cat. N: I3021)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv7i8","text":"1x cOmplete™, EDTA-free Protease Inhibitor Cocktail (Roche, Cat. N.: 11873580001)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3p633","text":"0.05% RNAsin plus RNase inhibitor (Promega, Cat. N.: N261A)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qftf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c9e6","text":"For 1ml","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45abu","text":"10µl Tris-HCI, pH 8.0 (1M)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a49cv","text":"20µl Igepal-CA630 (10% stock solution, freshly prepared)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uadp","text":"2µl NaCl (5M)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60sqb","text":"20µl cOmplete™, EDTA-free Protease Inhibitor Cocktail (50x stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"carrr","text":"0.5µl RNAsin plus RNase inhibitor","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv92a","text":"947.5 µl nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cignn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e838r","text":"GpC wash buffer (250µl)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97hf0","text":"25µl GpC buffer (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6396h","text":"50µl 5% Bovine Serum Albumin (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: AM2618)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ca00","text":"175µl nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bjqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vbo7","text":"GpC reaction buffer (50µl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mnfn","text":"7.5µl M.CviPI (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i87p","text":"5µl 10x GpC buffer (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tv0k","text":"1µl 32mM SAM (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ofbo","text":"36.5µl nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bensd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t7ve","text":"Library amplification mix (75µl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apc2t","text":"2.5µl indexing primers of the Methyl-Seq Set A Indexing Kit (Swift Bioscience, Cat. N.: 36024)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f617b","text":"25µl 5x EpiMark Hot Start Taq Reaction Buffer (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0490)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o337","text":"2.5µl 10mM dNTPs (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: N0447L)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64m59","text":"0.65µl EpiMark Hot Start Taq (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0490)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96oo5","text":"44.35µl nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5m976","text":"NOTE: Control DNA has to prepared only once and can be reused. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s9s1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5997","text":"To prepare GpC methylated control DNA, mix 10µl of CpG methylated pUC19 DNA (Zymo Research, Cat. N.: D5017) with 10µl of unmethylated lambda DNA (Promega, Cat. N.: D1521).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4asae","text":"Perform GpC methylation by mixing 20µl of the pUC19/lambda DNA mix with 30µl of the GpC methylation mix I and incubate for 1h @ 37 ˚C followed by 20 minutes at 65 ˚C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eu7vq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvm3h","text":"Perform a 1x AmpureXP (Agencourt, Cat. N.: A63881) purification by adding 50 µl of room temperature AmpureXP beads to the samples followed by a incubation of 10 minutes at room temperature under slow rotation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8hj6","text":"Shear the DNA to a targeted size of 550bp using following parameter on a Covaris S220 sonicator:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcf22","text":"Peak Incident Power (W)     18","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aesfb","text":"Duty Factor                             20%","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4smsu","text":"Cycles per Burst                    50","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4f0u8","text":"Treatment Time (s)               22","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3vdnj","text":"Resuspend dissociated cells in PBS to reach a maximal cell concentration of 2x106 cells/ml and add freshly prepared 2% Formaldehyde solution to reach a final concentration of 1%. Incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature with slow rotation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":80,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6saok","text":"Add 2.0M glycine solution (Invitrogen, Cat. N.: 15527013) to a final concentration of 0.2M to quench the reaction. Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes with slow rotation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d406c","text":"Centrifuge for 5 minutes at 500xg at 4°C. Discard supernatant into an appropriate collection container.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8i104","text":"Resuspend cells in 1ml of cold 1x PBS with 0.5% BSA (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: AM2618) and count the cell number. ","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1r1it","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7eque","text":"Fixed cells can be either FAC-sorted, directly used for NOME-seq or pelleted (2500xg for 5 minutes at 4˚C) and then snap frozen in liquid nitrogen for storage at -80˚C.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bboha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hc2c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hf4r","text":"NOTE: this protocol was optimized for 1x104 cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":51},{"style":"sup","offset":42,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i5gv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"806st","text":"Pellet fixed cells for 5 minutes at 2500xg (4˚C) and carefully resuspend them with 100µl of ice-cold Lysis Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjjoo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hc9e","text":"If cells were frozen, thaw the cell pellet first on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7magg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"259bs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l4u7","text":"Incubate on ice for exactly 10 minutes and centrifuge at 2500xg for 5 minutes at 4°C and remove the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c93nd","text":"Wash the nuclei pellet by adding 250µl GpC wash buffer followed by a centrifugation at 2500xg for 5 minutes at 4°C and the removal of the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29ejl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dg043","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9rj9","text":"Add 478µl freshly prepared Proteinase-K digestion mix and incubate at 55°C for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4r1u","text":"NOTE: for the highest yield, the libraries should be prepared directly after the bisulfite conversion and not more than 100ng of sheared DNA should be used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":157}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d36t0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47u6f","text":"Prior the bisulfite conversion add roughly 0.05% M.CviP-treated control DNA to the sample. Proceed with the bisulfite conversion using the EZ DNA Methylation-Gold Kit (Zymo Research) according to the manual instructions until the elution step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkrll","text":"Elute the bisulfite converted DNA in 16µl low EDTA TE water provided with the Accel-NGS® Methyl-Seq DNA Library Kit (Swift Bioscience, Cat. N.: 30024). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lti6","text":"Final amplification is performed with the with the EpiMark Hot Start Taq (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0490S) in 5 separate reactions in order to achieve a higher complexity. To do so, pipette 10µl of the purified and adapter ligated DNA in 5 separate PCR tubes and add 15µl of the Library amplification mix containing sample specific Methyl-Seq Set A Indexing Primers (Swift Bioscience, Cat. N.: 36024). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chpf8","text":"After the PCR is finished pool the different reactions of a sample together (~125µl total volume) and perform a 0.8x AmpureXP (Agencourt, Cat. N.: A63881) purification by adding 100µl of room temperature AmpureXP beads to the samples followed by a incubation of 10 minutes at room temperature under slow rotation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee512","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnetic-rack, remove the supernatant and wash the beads twice with freshly prepared 80% Ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"609qq","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnatic-rack, remove the supernatant and wash the beads twice with freshly prepared 80% Ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epg53","text":"After the last wash remove as much as possible of the 80% Ethanol and air-dry the beads for approximately 5 minutes at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vibf","text":"Resuspend the beads with 16µl nuclease-free water, incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature pellet the beads on a magnetic-rack and transfer the DNA containing supernatant into a Covaris microTUBE-15 AFA Beads Screw-Cap tubes (Covaris, Cat. N.: 520145).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nhj7","text":"Perform another 1x AmpureXP purification as described above und elute the purified DNA in 30µl nuclease-free water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9v23s","text":"Quantify the yield using the Qubit dsDNA High Sensitivity Assay (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: Q32851). Low amounts of DNA expected. Control DNA can be stored at -20˚C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1dv0u","text":"Carefully resuspend nuclei with 50µl GpC reaction buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pgjs","text":"Incubate for 3 hours at 37 ˚C with slight shaking (500 RPM) and add to the reaction every hour 0.5µl 32mM SAM (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S) and 1µl of M.CviPI (New England Biolabs, Cat. N.: M0227S).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg8vk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mpkq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b429r","text":"Add 53μl of 5M NaCl (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: AM9760G) and incubate at 68°C overnight (900rpm, 10sec, every 5 min.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93b3i","text":"Cool tubes at room temperature, add 1:1 volume Phenol/Chloroform/Isoamylalcohol (Invitrogen, Cat. N. 15593031), vortex for at least 30 seconds and spin with maximal speed for 10 minutes at 4˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fnbm","text":"Take the upper aqueous phase into a 2ml tube and resuspend with 2x volumes of ice cold 100% ethanol, 1/10th of the volume 3M NaAc (Ambion, Cat. N.: AM9740) and 1µl Glycogen (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: 10814010). Store the mix at -20˚C at least for 1 hour or -80˚C for 10-15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2raid","text":"Centrifuge at maximal speed for 20 minutes at 4°C. Carefully remove the supernatant by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2pqv","text":"Wash with 800μl freshly prepared 70% cold ethanol followed by centrifuge at maximal speed for 5 minutes at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpeid","text":"Wash with 400µl freshly prepared 70% cold ethanol and transfer everything to a 0.5ml tube (make sure glycogen pellet is transfered). Centrifuge at maximal speed for 5 minutes at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blevk","text":"Remove as much as possible of the ethanol and air-dry the pellet. Dissolve pellet in 16ul of 10mM Tris buffer pH 7.5 (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: 15567027) and incubate at 37°C for 15 minutes to fully dissolve DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ei64r","text":"Transfer 16µl of the sample into a Covaris microTUBE-15 AFA Beads Screw-Cap tube (Covaris, Cat. N.: 520145) and sheare DNA to a targeted size of 550bp using following parameter on a Covaris S220 sonicator:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpl51","text":"Peak Incident Power (W)     18","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c1ig","text":"Duty Factor                             20%","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s2sr","text":"Cycles per Burst                    50","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9kem3","text":"Treatment Time (s)               22","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cr08i","text":"Quantify the yield using the Qubit dsDNA High Sensitivity Assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89ihs","text":"Use 15µl of the bisulfite converted DNA for the library preparation using the Accel-NGS® Methyl-Seq DNA Library Kit according to the manual instruction until the final amplification step. Elute the DNA after the last purification step in 50µl low EDTA TE water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kii8","text":"Amplify library using the following PCR program: 95˚C 30s; {95˚C 15s, 61˚C 30s, 68 ˚C 60s} x10-14; 68˚C 5min; Hold at 10˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab47","text":"After the last wash remove as much as possible of the 80% Ethanol and air-dry the beads for approximately 5 minutes at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2h3dh","text":"Resuspend the beads with 15µl nuclease-free water, incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature, pellet the beads on a magnetic-rack and transfer the DNA containing supernatant into a new tube. Quantify the yield using the Qubit dsDNA High Sensitivity Assay (ThermoFisher, Cat. N.: Q32851)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: NOMe-seq of fixed cells
